msg.msgText: NOTES: 1. "Name" is a required item for testing an existing MQ QueueManager connection. It cannot be used with "QueueManagerName","ConnectionName", and "ChannelName". 2. "QueueManagerName","ConnectionName", and "ChannelName" are required items for a new connection testing. 3. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
